            <string language="no">Lys - bytning</string>
            <string language="en">Light - break</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht - Bruch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lumière - rupture</string>

          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hvordan brytes lyset i forskjellige prismer?</string>
            <string language="en">How does the light breake in different prisms?</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie das helle breake in den unterschiedlichen

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment va-t-il le breake léger dans différents
prismes ?</string>
          </description>

          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo  el breake ligero en diversos prismas?</string>
          </description>
